mapper.select: SELECT content, cnt AS num FROM ranking ORDER BY num DESC;
select time_h as num, COUNT(*) as content FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(endTime, '%H') AS time_h FROM traffic WHERE endTime >= curdate() and endTime < adddate(curdate(), 1))tmp GROUP BY time_h
SELECT * FROM traffic WHERE endTime >= #{start} and endTime <= #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE ranking AS T1, (SELECT content, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM traffic GROUP BY content) AS T2 SET T1.cnt = T2.cnt WHERE T1.content = T2.content
